assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Beijing ByteDance Network Technology Co Ltd\n  "}]
abstract_text: The embodiment of the application discloses a method and a device for identifying a class to which a vehicle belongs. One embodiment of the method comprises: acquiring a vehicle image to be identified; inputting the image of the vehicle to be identified into a pre-trained vehicle logo detection model to obtain vehicle logo information, wherein the brand comprises at least one vehicle series; inputting the image of the vehicle to be recognized into a pre-trained vehicle system detection model to obtain vehicle system information, wherein the vehicle system information is used for indicating a vehicle system to which the vehicle presented by the image of the vehicle to be recognized belongs; and generating vehicle type information based on the matching of the obtained vehicle logo information and the vehicle series information, wherein the vehicle type information is used for indicating the brand and the vehicle series to which the vehicle presented by the vehicle image to be identified belongs. According to the embodiment, the recognition accuracy rate under the application scene that the appearance of the vehicle is easy to be confused and the angle of the vehicle is rich is effectively improved, and then a guarantee is provided for recalling the result of high matching degree.
title: Method and device for identifying class to which vehicle belongs
applicants: Beijing ByteDance Network Technology Co Ltd

abstract_text: According to a preferred embodiment of the present invention, provided is a machine reading-based question and answer method. The machine reading-based question and answer method comprises the steps of: receiving and analyzing a user question; selecting at least one document in at least one domain corresponding to the user question and searching for a passage which is a response candidate determined to be suitable for the user question in the selected at least one document; obtaining at least one correct answer candidate value by inputting the user question and the corresponding passage to each at least one machine reading-based question and answer unit; and determining whether the at least one correct answer candidate value is a correct answer.
title: Device and Method for Machine Reading Comprehension Question and Answer

assignee_name_current: [{"assignee_name": "\n    Panasonic Intellectual Property Corp of America\n  "}]
abstract_text: The invention relates to an open circuit voltage measuring method, an open circuit voltage measuring apparatus and a recording medium. The open circuit voltage measuring method of the invention detects the connection between the secondary battery and the charger; judging whether the state of the secondary battery is stable or not in the case where the connection is detected; measuring a first open-circuit voltage, which is an open-circuit voltage before charging of the secondary battery, in a case where it is judged that the state of the secondary battery is stable; instructing the charger to start charging of the secondary battery; detecting the end of charging of the secondary battery; determining whether a state of the secondary battery is stable, in a case where an end of charging of the secondary battery is detected; measuring a second open circuit voltage, which is an open circuit voltage after the secondary battery is charged, in a case where it is judged that the state of the secondary battery is stable; the end of charging of the secondary battery is notified to the user. According to this configuration, the open circuit voltage can be accurately measured without giving a psychological burden to the user.
title: Open circuit voltage measuring method, open circuit voltage measuring device, and recording medium
applicants: Panasonic Intellectual Property Corp of America

assignee_name_orig: [{"assignee_name": "NTT Docomo Inc"}, {"assignee_name": "Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp"}]
